title: Bill Announcement – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Budget & Spending	

Issued on:
December 18, 2020
On Friday, December 18, 2020, the President signed into law:H.J.Res. 107, the “Further Additional Continuing Appropriations Act, 2021,” which provides fiscal year (FY) 2021 appropriations to Federal agencies through December 20, 2020, for continuing projects and activities of the Federal Government.
